Changes.Description: Fixed formatting and text issues in the multiple solves section. Fixed writing.
Removed 'then sweep' text after setups. More wording cohesion.

Changes.Solve: Fixed JSON issue with Steps called Substeps (old naming), so some steps were not showing up.
Changes.Description: Fixed formatting and text issues in the multiple solves section. Fixed writing.
Added a Stealth Rock to avoid some Focus Sash and Sturdy chances.
Added a Stealth Rock on Leftovers -> Dynamic Punch step to avoid some Focus Sash users one-shotting Chandelure.
Added new possible switch in: < If opponent uses Water Spout, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Machamp or Blaziken. Switch to Chandelure ×4 Calm Mind + X.Speed >.
Renamed Drapion to Gliscor.
Added new experimental solves for when it starts using Leaf Storm.
Added new possible solves, Dronad noted it usually switches out to something else.
Added info of who's switching out (Choice Banded Durant), and a 2x Calm Mind step on setup.
On < Use Trick -> If it switches into Garchomp -> And you get a Life Orb > step, only 2 Sword Dances are needed, changed from 3.
Only one Swords Dance is needed to sweep on here, changed from 2.
Added new lead with solve.
Removed step where it assumes Latios and Lucario are on the same team; they can’t.
Added sprite images for all pokemons. Addition by c4v.
Fixed duplicated step.
Added more depth into Blissey -> Fire Blast -> Damage between 19.4% and 23% to 19.4% and 24.5%.
No solve for Garchomp switch. Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Removed X.Defend from Staraptor step.
Changed step on Leftovers -> Used surf.
Sometimes Vileplume can come out after Golduck switches out.
Reduced choice band solve.
